title: nambi iru manamE Atma
sahitya:
nambi iru manamE Atma nAthanai Ananda bOdhanaiyE dinam


anupallavi

  anbirundAl aruLAgi arivAgi antara mEgham pOl vandu vazhanguvAn


caraNam    aghandaiyai viTTu viDu nenjil Azhndadait-toTTu viDu
ihAm tanil param tannai ughandiDak-kATTiyE sukham tarum shuDarinai jagam tanil nirantaram
